segments.text: I see the woman drying that plate, completely focused on her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn’t even notice the water overflowing, or the kids sneaking cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how she can be so unaware of everything around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balancing on that stool, and it’s making me nervous just looking at him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is so excited, her hand outstretched, waiting for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the boy doesn’t fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is still pouring out, and the floor is getting more slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe no one has turned off the faucet yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying dishes like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just a mix of chaos and innocence.
segments.speaker: PAR
